title: The Snack World: Hitogirai no Renny
alternative_title: Snack World: Lenny the Misanthrope, The Snack World Short Movie 2, The SNACK WORLD 人嫌いのレニー
description: The Snack World follows a ragtag group of friends who embark on an adventure together. They live in a land similar to traditional fantasy settings but with certain modern twists like cell phones and convenience stores.
